name: air-blue dream
description:
You are a flightless bird on an upward climb through forested foothills.

Choose between a stroll…

  • go your own pace through increasingly difficult terrain
  • frequent run-ins with the forest's inhabitants, whose faces look suspiciously like yours
  • you can't die

or a sprint.

  • traverse a random path at high speed
  • the forest is uninhabited
  • you will die

Keep in mind the path ahead may be behind you.


Keyboard controls
  • Run: Left/Right, A/D
  • Jump: Shift, Ctrl, Space, Z, X, C, Q, E
  • Crouch: Down, S
  • Enter a portal: Up, W
Gamepad controls
  • Run: D-pad left/D-pad right
  • Jump: A, B, X, Y
  • Crouch: D-pad down
  • Enter a portal: D-pad up

Credits
  • All source code, graphics, music, and sound effects created by quisseh.
  • Code was written in C using the SDL 2.0 library.
  • Graphics were drawn in Paint.NET.
  • Music and sound effects were made in GarageBand and edited in Audacity.
  • Fonts, used with permission: Cabin Sketch by Impallari Type and Nagurigaki Crayon by Sumomomoji.
